# This file is generated by the script SetUpCtestFiles.py
# If possible, modify the script to fix any issues with the CMakeLists.txt files

file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/vpat.cir ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/vpat.cir ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/vpat_step.cir ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/vpat_step.cir ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/vpat_step.cir.sh ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/vpat_step.cir.sh ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(CHMOD ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/vpat_step.cir.sh PERMISSIONS OWNER_READ OWNER_WRITE OWNER_EXECUTE GROUP_READ GROUP_EXECUTE WORLD_READ WORLD_EXECUTE)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/bad_vpat.cir ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/bad_vpat.cir ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/bad_vpat.cir.sh ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/bad_vpat.cir.sh ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(CHMOD ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/bad_vpat.cir.sh PERMISSIONS OWNER_READ OWNER_WRITE OWNER_EXECUTE GROUP_READ GROUP_EXECUTE WORLD_READ WORLD_EXECUTE)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/bad_vpat.cir.tags ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/bad_vpat.cir.tags ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/bad_vpat.cir.options ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/bad_vpat.cir.options ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}VPAT/bad_vpat.cir.sh COMMAND perl -I${XyceRegressionTestScripts} bad_vpat.cir.sh $<TARGET_FILE:Xyce> ${XYCE_VERIFY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} bad_vpat.cir ${OutputDataDir}/VPAT/bad_vpat.cir.prn )
set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}VPAT/bad_vpat.cir.sh PROPERTY LABELS "serial;parallel;nightly")
set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}VPAT/bad_vpat.cir.sh PROPERTIES TIMEOUT 30)
set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}VPAT/bad_vpat.cir.sh PROPERTIES TIMEOUT 30)
add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}VPAT/vpat.cir COMMAND Xyce vpat.cir )
set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}VPAT/vpat.cir PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;valgrind;vpat")
set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}VPAT/vpat.cir PROPERTIES FIXTURES_SETUP vpat.cir)
add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}VPAT/vpat.cir.verify COMMAND ${XYCE_VERIFY} vpat.cir ${OutputDataDir}/VPAT/vpat.cir.prn vpat.cir.prn )
set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}VPAT/vpat.cir.verify PROPERTIES FIXTURES_REQUIRED vpat.cir)
add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}VPAT/vpat_step.cir.sh COMMAND perl -I${XyceRegressionTestScripts} vpat_step.cir.sh $<TARGET_FILE:Xyce> ${XYCE_VERIFY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} vpat_step.cir ${OutputDataDir}/VPAT/vpat_step.cir.prn )
set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}VPAT/vpat_step.cir.sh PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;valgrind;vpat")
